body.p: Web-based interaction with Oracc II is implemented using three daisy-chained programs: wx, qx, and px.

dl.dd: wx is the web executable, and is the cgi-bin program that resolves URLs
qx is the search engine; wx calls qx when there is a new search, and qx calls the pager, px, to present the results
px is the pager, presenting data from multiple data sources and in multiple modalities
